import re

def create_palindrome(input_string):
    input_string = input_string.lower()
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^a-z]', '', input_string)
    palindrome = cleaned_string - cleaned_string[::-1]
    return palindrome

import re

def create_palindrome(input_string):
    input_string = input_string.lower()
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^a-z]', '', input_string)
    palindrome = cleaned_string * cleaned_string[::-1]
    return palindrome

import re

def create_palindrome(input_string):
    input_string = input_string.lower()
    cleaned_string = re.sub('', '', input_string)
    palindrome = cleaned_string + cleaned_string[::-1]
    return palindrome

import re

def create_palindrome(input_string):
    input_string = input_string.lower()
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^a-z]', 'MUTATED', input_string)
    palindrome = cleaned_string + cleaned_string[::-1]
    return palindrome

import re

def create_palindrome(input_string):
    input_string = input_string.lower()
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^a-z]', '', input_string)
    palindrome = cleaned_string + cleaned_string[::--1]
    return palindrome
